about.name: Ranjith Varatharajan
about.title: Application Development Specialist
about.tagline: Design is passion | Code is poetry
about.summary: Hello there, I am an Application Development Specialist, working for Accenture India and lives in Coimbatore.

experience.title: Application Development Specialist
experience.description: I am full-stack developer working with ASP.NET Web Forms, MVC, Angular, C# and SQL Server. I am currently a front-end software engineer of a small but dedicated team in our Engineering Solutions Team. This team is responsible for troubleshooting client issues and providing fixes in a quick turn around. We work directly with our Client Support and Services department to ensure prompt delivery of fixes as well as to keep up to date on client escalations.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Made changes and fixes to an existing ecommerce application. Started on large scale web/data mining project. Maintained a high level of quality. Worked on large projects while maintaining deadline and high quality. Used SSIS/SSRS to create reports for the application.
